npp.title: Net Primary Production (NPP)
npp.description: Model-estimated net primary production (NPP), which is the amount of carbon available from plants.

rh.title: Heterotrophic Respiration (Rh)
rh.description: Model-estimated heterotrophic respiration (Rh), which is the flux of carbon from the soil to the atmosphere.

nee.title: Net Ecosystem Exchange (NEE)
nee.description: Model-estimated net ecosystem exchange (NEE), which is the net carbon flux to the atmosphere.

fire.title: Fire Emissions (FIRE)
fire.description: Model-estimated flux of carbon to the atmosphere from wildfires.

fuel.title: Wood Fuel Emissions (FUEL)
fuel.description: Model-estimated flux of carbon to the atmosphere from wood burned for fuel.
